        Check if the firstName field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the cleared string in the firstName field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a user with no firstName fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkInvalidLastNameSave

        Check if the lastName field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the cleared string in the lastName field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a user with no lastName fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

        public void checkInvalidUsernameSave()
        Check if the username field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the cleared string in the username field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a user with no username fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkInvalidPhoneNumberSave

        public void checkInvalidPhoneNumberSave()
        Check if the phoneNumber field exists with assertNotNull. Check if the cleared string in the phoneNumber field is "" with assertEquals. Check if saving a user with no phoneNumber fails with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the user is alerted to the erroneous field with assertTrue.

      • checkValidSave

        public void checkValidSave()
        Check if erroneous field alert is invisible on valid entry with assertFalse. Check if saving a valid profile edit succeeds with assertCurrentActivity. Check if the saved edit shows up in ProfileFragment with assertTrue.

      • checkDiscardDialog

        public void checkDiscardDialog()
        Check if user is kept in EditProfileActivity when they try to exit but have unsaved edits with assertCurrentActivity. Check if discard dialog appears with assertTrue.
